name: Theme_from_Twin_Peaks:_Fire_Walk_with_Me
text:
Theme from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
"Theme from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me" is an instrumental that appears in Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me.
A version titled "She Would Die for Love" with lyrics written by David Lynch was recorded by Julee Cruise for her 1993 album, The Voice of Love.
